# Each vendor package has structure:
  
+ config
    + default.ini
    + default.yaml
    + default.json
    
+ doc
    + How it works
+ docker
    + Docker files, composer
+ os
    + windows, linux, ...
        + upgrade
        + downgrade
        + start
        + stop
    
+ test
    + test script to check how it works

upgrade
downgrade
